attributes.action: MP's Salary and Allowances Stopped for 7 days a Year
attributes.additional_details:
In light of the fact that the Treasury Spending Round 2013

-"requires all unemployed claimants, and those earning less than the government expects them to, to wait seven days before becoming eligible for financial support" -

in order to curb spending we would like

"all MPs to lose seven days salary and allowances per annum"

as a way to curb spending to demonstrate that "we're all in it together"
